subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Gary Christian used to sell knives. At 40, he is the oldest first-year player on the PGA tour this season. On Thursday, he climbed onto the leader board at the Travelers Championship.
snippet: Gary Christian used to sell knives. At 40, he is the oldest first-year player on the PGA tour this season. On Thursday, he climbed onto the leader board at the Travelers Championship.
